title: Unit 2 test
notes: Scheduled for in our lesson on Friday 8 January. I've reattached the past paper questions for your review, and this time included the mark schemes.

title: Theme park scenario
notes:
With reference to lesson 11 notes of Computational Thinking, analyse the pre-release and 
1. Draw a structure diagram for it
2. Write pseudo code or a flowchart for one of the sub-tasks you identify.
3. You do **NOT** need to write any programming for this scenario at this time.

title: Validation algorithm (isbn/luhn/hkid)
notes: With the return to zoom lessons, I'm going to restore the practice of regular submission of class work to Classroom so I can see what you are able to get accomplished each lesson. Please upload your progress on your isbn/credit card/hkid validation algorithm here. It doesn't matter if it is incomplete, it just helps me keep track of where everyone is at. Thank you.
